tool_description: Evaluates backup retention rules against backup metadata to determine which backups should be kept, archived, or deleted based on configured policies.

policy_id.description: ID of the retention policy to apply

backup_ages.description: Backup age data in format: path|age_days|age_category

force_evaluation.description: Force evaluation even if policy is inactive

error_messages: Policy not found: The specified policy_id does not exist or has been deleted.
Invalid backup age format: Each entry must follow format 'path|age_days|age_category'.
Policy inactive: The specified policy is inactive. Use force_evaluation=true to override.
Backup ages limit exceeded: Maximum 10000 backup entries allowed per evaluation.
usage: Provide policy_id and backup_ages array to evaluate retention decisions. Set force_evaluation=true to apply inactive policies.

retention_decisions.description: Decisions for each backup in format: path|action|reason where action is keep/archive/delete

action_summary.description: Summary counts for each action type (keep/archive/delete)

policy_compliance.description: Overall compliance status and any policy violations found
